body: 1. They fail the linkchecker with the following error: ``` URL `https://www.rust-lang.org/en-US/documentation.html' Name `Start with Rust' Parent URL file:///home/travis/build/TokTok/website/toktok-site/get-started.html, line 130, col 7 Real URL https://www.rust-lang.org/en-US/documentation.html Check time 0.592 seconds Result Error: SSLError: [Errno 1] _ssl.c:510: error:14077410:SSL routines:SSL23_GET_SERVER_HELLO:sslv3 alert handshake failure ``` 2. We don't currently have any Rust code in the Toktok repos. --- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/toktok/website/41)

Reviewed 1 of 1 files at r1.
Review status: all files reviewed at latest revision, all discussions resolved.

---



*Comments from [Reviewable](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/website/41)*
<!-- Sent from Reviewable.io -->

>They fail the linkchecker with the following error

It would be better to open an issue against rust infrastructure, so that the actual problem would be fixed for everyone, rather than making a specific to repo workaround.

>We don't currently have any Rust code in the Toktok repos.

AFAIK that is to be changed, so having learning resources in place already would be a good idea.

---

Review status: all files reviewed at latest revision, 1 unresolved discussion.

---

*[toktok/get-started.md, line 10 at r1](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/website/41#-KaHd3Fh9sZsR8ekXH3G:-KaHd3Fh9sZsR8ekXH3H:b-4kcpdm) ([raw file](https://github.com/toktok/website/blob/031c203cc587d586a801a80834596671305fdb47/toktok/get-started.md#L10)):*
> ```Markdown
> Collection of resources that will help you get started writing code.
> 
> When in doubt, you can always [contact us](index.html#contact-us). :)
> ```

Why adding a dot and removing hyphen?

With this change it looks unnatural.

---


*Comments from [Reviewable](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/website/41#-:-KaHdISPIUXHdz51slVH:bz784xw)*
<!-- Sent from Reviewable.io -->

It'll be easy to add back. --- Review status: all files reviewed at latest revision, 1 unresolved discussion. --- *[toktok/get-started.md, line 10 at r1](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/website/41#-KaHd3Fh9sZsR8ekXH3G:-KaI4a6QSHaLUBkpAwDd:bht0rgi) ([raw file](https://github.com/toktok/website/blob/031c203cc587d586a801a80834596671305fdb47/toktok/get-started.md#L10)):*
Previously, zetok wrote…
Why adding a dot and removing hyphen? With this change it looks unnatural.
It's consistent. Perhaps we should replace the ":)" on the site with ":-)" elsewhere. @robinlinden revert this change - let's just get linkchecker working and then make other changes. --- *Comments from [Reviewable](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/website/41#-:-KaI4GkvrAGRWisvVGpa:b2nd783)*

https://github.com/rust-lang/rust-www/issues/686
